title: Assistance regarding PESSAT
content:
Hey! I'm a fellow candidate who is taking up the PESSAT entrance exam this year . Any tips by you seniors regarding what to study in these last moments would be appreciated. The format is 

180 minutes
40 questions CHEMISTRY
60 questions MATHEMATICS
60 questions PHYSICS
20 questions ENGLISH 

Thanks !

comments.body:
Go through all necessary formulas once and keep them at your fingertips. Directly applying them will save time rather than trying to get it from a general formula. Especially in maths

Good luck!
Is there anyone who's going for lateral entry?
